message: As their footsteps fade into the distance, I sink to my knees and stare at Clear.
The scene I just witnessed was too... impossible. It's only by sheer force of will that I manage to get back to my feet.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you okay...?"
Smoke is still coming off his head. I have to fight to get the words out through my fear.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How are you so calm? We have to rinse that off or something before it's too late... We have to do something!"

name: クリア
message: "I'm fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're not! You're still smoking! We have to...!"

name: クリア
message: "I'm fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Enough bullshit! Just gimme a break already!"

name: クリア
message: "Is that an order?"

name: クリア
message: "Even if you make it an order... that's the one thing I can't do!"
Clear dashes off.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Hey! Clear! Wait!"
What the hell?! He ran away?! Where is he even going?!
I chase after him, my thoughts a jumble of confusion.
What the hell is he thinking?! No way he's fine after that!
And now he's running away?!
Clear is a lot faster than I expected, and I soon lose sight of him. I stop in an alley to get my bearings.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where did he...?"
I hear the sound of water flowing.
It's coming from the narrow alley to my left.
